title: How far can you throw a playing card...?
content:
After watching mythbusters, i decided to do a research on this topic, and found some amazing things. Check this out.

[url=http://www.ricksmithjr.com/media/video/Final.rm]Video link[/url]

I can do this too (not this good though) but my technique is slightly different.

Anyways, im gonna go practice some more [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: How far can you throw a playing card...?
content:
i can throw them from one side of the room to the other (roughly 5 metres) and easily put a slight dent in the wall so i could definately go much further. I should try this outside.
